fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Teleport**: Each night, you may swap two people. Anybody visiting one person will visit the other.
**Look**: Visit one person. You will attack one random visitor(2 uses)
**Farm Pearl**: Farm for an ender pearl, giving the current Minecraft(Head) an ender pearl.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You may attack your teammates
-If the head role has 5 ender pearls, even while this is dead, turn a random non head role into ender dragon. If the head role is the only role alive, they turn into an ender dragon.
-Upon death, the head role gains 2 ender pearls.
